thread.title: Traffic blocked in River Rd in Hutt Valley after horse float rolls, trapping horse
thread.title_full: Traffic blocked in River Rd in Hutt Valley after horse float rolls, trapping horse

author: Damian George
title: Traffic blocked in River Rd in Hutt Valley after horse float rolls, trapping horse
text:
Traffic blocked in River Rd in Hutt Valley after horse float rolls, trapping horse DAMIAN GEORGE Last updated 11:01, February 5 2017 
Police have been called to River Rd in Hutt Valley, where a horse is trapped after a float rolled. 
Firefighters are working to free a horse trapped in a trailer following a crash in Hutt Valley on State Highway 2 
The horse is said to be in a distressed state after the trailer it was in rolled in River Rd, between Whakatiki St and Moonshine Hill Rd, about 9.50am on Sunday. 
Do you know anything about this incident? Email 
Fire Service staff are now working to remove the roof from the trailer, a police spokesman said. 
A veterinarian and several police vehicles were also at the scene, while animal control and the SPCA have been notified. 
READ MORE: 
The trailer was attached to a car and had "jack-knifed and rolled", the spokesman said. 
There are reports that traffic is blocked on both lanes and vehicles are bumper to bumper. 
Police are redirecting traffic in the Silverstream suburb. 
The vehicle was still upright but the horse float was on its side.
